mapper.select: SELECT su.id,su.user_name,su.password,su.nick_name,su.user_profile,su.user_url,su.mobile,su.email,su.status,su.user_desc,su.user_registered,sr.id as role_id,sr.name as role_name,sr.cn_name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru on su.id= sru.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr on sru.sys_role_id = sr.id WHERE su.user_name = #{username}
